Description:
Detects commandline operations on shell history files

Author: Mikhail Larin, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious History File Operations - Linux
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where (type = 'execve' and (log like '%.bash_history%' or log like '%.zsh_history%' or log like '%.zhistory%' or log like '%.history%' or log like '%.sh_history%' or log like '%fish_history%'))
